fields_of_interest: Agriculture, International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: The 2030 - 2050 climate and energy framework, especially by delivering environmental and health benefits (e.g. through reduced air pollution); international development cooperation
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit: The Climate and Clean Air Coalition is a voluntary partnership of governments, intergovernmental organizations, businesses, scientific institutions and civil society organizations committed to improving air quality and protecting the climate through actions to reduce short-lived climate pollutants.
